text:
ESO Solutions | Austin, TX, USA | Onsite, Full-time | up to $100k | https://www.esosolutions.com/about/software-developer-test/

We are looking for a cross-breed of a data analyst and QA engineer to help us sort out and prevent data quality issues in a large complex data set that we manage from emergency service providers. SQL, big data skills, experience with cloud providers and solid foundation in software testing would come in handy in this job.

If you like what you are hearing, please, apply at the link above. DM me here on on Twitter https://twitter.com/bkolics if you have questions. I am the hiring manager.
